DOC.brief_summary: Low back pain may be reduced after cervical spinal surgery
DOC.brief_title: Change of Lumbar Symptom After Surgical Treatment for Patients With Cervical Stenosis
DOC.detailed_description: The improved back pain score after cervical spinal surgery would be higher than that after non-surgical treatment.
DOC.criteria: all patients with cervical myelopathy and low back pain previous surgery at the lumbar spine malignancy previous surgery at the cervical spine
